oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Medal from association of Union ex-POWs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Medallion suspended from gold bar. It commemorates the 21st Annual Session of the Ohio Association of Union Ex-Prisoners of War. The event took place in Marysville, Ohio, June 19-20, 1901. Medallion is decorated with an eagle atop crossed rifles and army backpack. Below is an illustration of a dog attacking a prisoner. Around the scene is printed "Andersonville 1865/Death Before Dishonor."
